title: Dark Valkyrie Diana...Why remove Hair piece
body: As it says..why was the hair piece for diana's Dark Valkyrie skin removed and will it ever come back?{{champion:131}}

replies.body: Well see i joined late in 2015 so... I don't rly know wut happen if u could fill it in for me that would be great
Diana got hammered with gragas and left it at the Bandle city theme night (was ladies night so they didnt have to pay the cover charge)
